articles.author: ANI
articles.title: India sends 15th consignment of wheat to Afghanistan; 36,000 MT sent so far
articles.description: India on July 02 sent its 15th consignment of 2,500 Metric Tonnes of wheat to Afghanistan as humanitarian assistance via the Attari-Wagah border, Punjab. A total of 36,000 Metric Tonnes of wheat has been sent by the Government of India so far.
